function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased reliance on smart city technologies","Impact":"Over-reliance on technology may lead to neglect of traditional public health measures","Mitigation":"Promote a balanced approach that combines technological solutions with traditional public health measures","Technologies":"Smart city systems, IoT sensors, machine learning","People":"Public health authorities, city planners, urban developers","Owner":"Public health authorities, city planners, urban developers"},{"Description":"Data privacy and security risks","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive health data, leading to privacy violations and potential misuse of data","Mitigation":"Implement robust data security measures, encryption, and access control policies. Comply with data protection regulations","Technologies":"Data encryption, access control, compliance software","People":"Residents, patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Data protection authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Disparities in access to smart technologies","Impact":"Unequal access to technology may exacerbate health disparities and widen the digital divide","Mitigation":"Implement policies to ensure equitable access to smart city technologies, improve digital literacy, and provide support for marginalized communities","Technologies":"Policy implementation, digital literacy programs, community support initiatives","People":"Marginalized communities, underserved populations","Owner":"Government, community organizations"}]}
